welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pulilan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our town known for its colorful fiestas, delicious local delicacies, and picturesque countryside. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Pulilan has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Shakey’s
restaurants.description: Shakey’s is a pizzeria located in Pulilan.
restaurants.address: Dona Remedios Trinidad Hwy (at Plaridel-Pulilan Diversion Rd), 3005 Pulilan, Bulacan

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Pulilan.
restaurants.address: Dona Remedios Trinidad Hwy, Brgy Cut-cot, 3005 Pulilan, Bulacan

restaurants.name: Max's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Max's Restaurant is a fried chicken joint located in Pulilan.
restaurants.address: Doña Remedios Trinidad Hwy, 3005 Pulilan, Bulacan

restaurants.name: McDonald's

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights operated by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving domestic flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage and speed.
